content.description:
Segregated Restrooms, Circa 1960
Photo by Hulton Archive/Getty Images
content.question: The practice depicted in the image was protected by which American policy?

choices.label: The expansion of voting rights to Black Americans during Reconstruction
The ratification of the Fourteenth Amendment to the Constitution
The Supreme Court ruling in the case Plessy v. Ferguson
The Election of 1876 and the Compromise of 1877

content.answer: The Supreme Court ruling in the case Plessy v. Ferguson

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
